resourceTemplates.name: todo-task-list-items
resourceTemplates.title: To Do Task List items
resourceTemplates.description: Lists todo items for a Microsoft To Do task list. Replace {listId} with the list id.

resourceTemplates.name: todo-task-list-item-details
resourceTemplates.title: To Do Task List item details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets the details for a todo item. Replace {listId} and {taskId} with the list and task ids.

resourceTemplates.name: todo-task-list
resourceTemplates.title: Microsoft To Do task list
resourceTemplates.description: Gets details for a Microsoft To Do task list. Replace {listId} with the list id.
